title: Runaway course
learningObjectives: Understand the basic concepts of programming
Build robust and scalable Runner applications
Critical thinking and Problem-solving using programming

finalProjectDetails.overview: The final project will involve building a scalable and robust Runner application
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: The final project should be submitted as a Zip file. The file should contain all the source codes, along with a detailed README that explains how to run the application
